net.proteusframework.core.script

Class ScriptUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.script.ScriptUtility

  • @Configurable
public class ScriptUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to work with Java ™ Scripting Engines.

    Most users of the utility will use the method getScriptedInterface(ScriptContext, ScriptIdentifier, CharSource, Class, String). This will return an instance of an interface that a script implements given the script and the interface.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    ScriptEngine

      • CONTEXT_SCRIPT_IDENTIFIER

        public static final java.lang.String CONTEXT_SCRIPT_IDENTIFIER
        Context variable name. This is intended to have a ScriptIdentifier as the corresponding value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ScriptUtility

        public ScriptUtility()
        Create a new instance.

        This is a Spring @Configurable. Make sure you instantiate this after the Spring context is started.

    • Method Detail

      • evalScript

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Object evalScript(@Nonnull
                                   javax.script.ScriptContext scriptContext,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   ScriptIdentifier scriptIdentifier,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   InputSupplier<java.io.Reader> scriptContentSupplier)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   javax.script.ScriptException
        Evaluate a script.

        NOTE: It is possible this could be a slow process which temporarily blocks the current thread.

        Parameters:
        scriptContext - the script context. This is passed to the script during evaluation. See ScriptContext.
        scriptIdentifier - the script identifier.
        scriptContentSupplier - the script content supplier. This supplies the script itself.
        Returns:
        the result of evaluation. May be null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error during evaluation of the script.
        javax.script.ScriptException - if there is an error evaluating the script.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no script engine found for the specified script identifier.

      • getScriptedInterface

        public <S> S getScriptedInterface(javax.script.ScriptContext scriptContext,
                         java.lang.Class<S> interfaceType,
                         java.lang.String interfaceContextVariable,
                         javax.script.Invocable invoc,
                         @Nullable
                         java.lang.Object evalObject)
                       throws javax.script.ScriptException
        Get an instance of the specified interfaceType for the specified object, evalObject. If evalObject is not specified, an attempt to obtain an instance from the script context using interfaceContextVariable will be made.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the interface type.
        Parameters:
        scriptContext - the script context.
        interfaceType - the interface type.
        interfaceContextVariable - the variable.
        invoc - the invocable.
        evalObject - the evaluated object. May be null.
        Returns:
        the scripted interface instance.
        Throws:
        javax.script.ScriptException - on error.

      • getScriptedInterface

        public <S> S getScriptedInterface(javax.script.ScriptContext scriptContext,
                         ScriptIdentifier scriptIdentifier,
                         CharSource scriptContentSupplier,
                         java.lang.Class<S> interfaceType,
                         java.lang.String interfaceContextVariable)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              javax.script.ScriptException
        Get an instance of an interface for the specified script. The script is composed on the properties: scriptIdentifier and scriptContentSupplier. The scriptIdentifier holds the meta-data of the script and the scriptContentSupplier provides the script data / content.

        NOTE: It is possible this could be a slow process which temporarily blocks the current thread.

        Type Parameters:
        S - the interface.
        Parameters:
        scriptContext - the script context. This is passed to the script during evaluation. See ScriptContext.
        scriptIdentifier - the script identifier.
        scriptContentSupplier - the script content supplier.
        interfaceType - the interface type.
        interfaceContextVariable - the interface context variable (e.g. "scriptable"). May be null if the implementation uses global functions to implement the interface.
        Returns:
        the interface implementation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error during evaluation of the script.
        javax.script.ScriptException - if there is an error evaluating the script.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no script engine found for the specified script identifier.

      • getScriptEngine

        @Nonnull
public javax.script.ScriptEngine getScriptEngine(@Nonnull
                                                ScriptIdentifier scriptIdentifier)
                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get a ScriptEngine instance that is compatible with the specified scriptIdentifier.
        Parameters:
        scriptIdentifier - script identifier.
        Returns:
        the script engine.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file name / mime type has no compatible engine registered with the ScriptEngineManager.

      • getScriptEngineManager

        public javax.script.ScriptEngineManager getScriptEngineManager()
        Get the ScriptEngineManager used by this utility class.
        Returns:
        the ScriptEngineManager.

      • populateScriptContext

        public void populateScriptContext(javax.script.ScriptContext scriptContext,
                         @Nullable
                         java.lang.String fileName,
                         @Nullable
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> additionalAttributes,
                         @Nullable
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Populate the script context with standard variables.
        • Sets the additionalAttributes if specified.
        • Sets filename attribute
        • Sets ScriptAttributes._loading_params to false
        • Sets ScriptAttributes._testing to false
        • Sets ScriptAttributes._logger to a logger based on the file name.
        • Sets ScriptAttributes._params to parameters or an empty collection
        Parameters:
        scriptContext - the context.
        fileName - the file name.
        additionalAttributes - optional additional attributes.
        parameters - optional parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - no script engine found for the specified script.

      • setCache

        @Autowired(required=false)
public void setCache(ScriptableCache cache)
        Set the cache.

        Intended to be set by dependency injection.

        Parameters:
        cache - the cache.
